name: pressure

effect.sun_moon: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.

short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

flavor_text.sun_moon: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
